doc.title: A Good Test of High Explosives
doc.plot: First part of the picture shows the firing and recoil of a 12 inch rifle loaded with a full charge of brown prismatic powder and a projectile filled with 110 lbs. of Maximite. The second part of the picture shows the projectile striking and completely demolishing a target composed of Harveyized steel armor plate and corresponding to the side armor of a battleship.
